events.query: It's the time to take one pill Apixaban for stroke safety
events.requery: Did you take one Apixaban pill which you were supposed to take at 9 AM?
events.details: Take one pill of Apixaban after breakfast

events.query: Please do the arm movement exercise for 5 minutes
events.requery: Did you do the arm movement exercise which you were supposed to do at 9 AM?
events.details: Use your left arm to assist the right arm through some functional tasks

events.query: It's the time to take one pill Lisinoprill for blood pressure control
events.requery: Did you take one Lisinoprill pill which you were supposed to take at 1 PM?
events.details: Take one pill of Lisinoprill after lunch.

events.query: It's the time to do an ECG. Do you want to try it now?
events.details: Press the crown twice to go to Apps, tap on the ECG app, and follow the instructions.

events.query: Please do the arm movement exercise for 5 minutes
events.requery: Did you do the arm movement exercise which you were supposed to do at 5 PM?
events.details: Use your left arm to assist the right arm through some functional tasks

events.query: It's the time to do an ECG. Do you want to try it now?
events.details: Press the crown twice to go to Apps, tap on the ECG app, and follow the instructions.
